mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.tarifa_reserva, t2.nueva_tarifa, t2.tarifa_estacionamiento, (SELECT count(*) from t_reserva where t_reserva.id_playa = t1.id and fecha_reserva = NOW()) as reservados, (6371 * ACOS(SIN(RADIANS(t1.latitud)) * SIN(RADIANS(#{latitud})) + COS(RADIANS(t1.longitud - #{longitud})) * COS(RADIANS(t1.latitud)) * COS(RADIANS(#{latitud})))) as distance FROM t_playa t1, t_tarifa t2 WHERE t1.id=t2.id_playa AND (6371 * ACOS(SIN(RADIANS(t1.latitud)) * SIN(RADIANS(#{latitud})) + COS(RADIANS(t1.longitud - #{longitud})) * COS(RADIANS(latitud)) * COS(RADIANS(#{latitud})))) < #{distancia} ORDER BY distance ASC
SELECT t2.*, t1.tarifa_estacionamiento, t1.tarifa_reserva, t1.nueva_tarifa FROM t_tarifa t1, t_playa t2 WHERE t1.id_playa = t2.id AND t2.id = #{id_playa}
SELECT * FROM t_reserva ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT t1.*, t2.nombre FROM t_tarifa t1, t_playa t2 WHERE t1.id_playa = t2.id
mapper.update: UPDATE t_tarifa SET nueva_tarifa=#{tarifa}, fregistro = NOW() WHERE id=#{idPlaya}
